name: 邱揚淳
objective:
The contents include elastic and plastic deformation in materials，dislocations，high temperature deformation，fracture， creep and fatigue.
本課程內容包括材料彈塑性變形、材料缺陷、材料強化方式、變形機制、破壞，潛變及疲勞。
schedule:
CH 1 序論 Introduction
CH2 彈性、黏彈性與塑性 Elasticity ,Viscoelasticity and Plasticity
CH3 結構不完美 Imperfections
CH4 塑性變形與加工硬化 Geometry of Deformation and Work-Hardening
CH5 固溶強化、析出強化、散佈強化、麻田散轉變 Solid Solution, Precipitation, Dispersion Strengthening and Martensitic Transformation
CH6 破裂 - 巨觀 / 微觀 Fracture: Macroscopic/Microscopic Aspects
CH7 疲勞 Fatigue
CH8 潛變與超塑性 Creep and Superplasticity
CH9 腐蝕與應力腐蝕開裂 Corrosion and Environmentally Assisted Fracture
materials:
Text book
1. Marc André Meyers, Krishan Kumar Chawla, "Mechanical Behavior of Materials" 2nd, Cambridge University Pres.
2.Gregory N. Haidemenopoulos, "Physical Metallurgy: Principles and Design", 1st, CRC Press.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
